site_name: South Thames College tower and Welbeck House Wandsworth High Street and 17 -27 Garratt Lane SW18
description: This Council has been asked for its observations on application submitted to Wandsworth Council (ref No 2019/1141) for Non-material amendment to planning permission dated 08/07/2015 ref  2014/5149(Demolition of existing buildings and erection of four new buildings ranging in height from 4 to 26 storeys to provide 201 residential units, 2,458sq.m of commercial floor space (Class A1, A2, A3, A4 and A5, B1(a)) and D1 (relocation of Wandsworth library) and associated parking, access routes, amenity space, public realm works and alterations to the adjacent Old Burial Ground on Garratt Lane.) to allow changes to the height of the windows on block b and c, change to triple with windows to two separate windows with cladding in between on block B. To allow changes to the wording on condition 9,12,28,29,35.3 and 37 to prior to occupation of each block.
